content: What famous novel by Jane Austen, first published in 1813, centers around the character Elizabeth Bennet?

The famous novel by Jane Austen that was first published in 1813 and centers around the character Elizabeth Bennet is "Pride and Prejudice." This timeless classic explores themes of love, marriage, and social class in 19th-century England through the witty and intelligent Elizabeth Bennet and her complex relationship with Mr. Darcy.
